errors.error_description: Incorrect pip command syntax using --requirements instead of -r
Unnecessary dependency tensorflow added to the installation list that is not mentioned in prerequisites
correction_candidates: Remove pip3 install tensorflow from the conda installation commands
Add tensorflow to the prerequisites section before installing it
Replace tensorflow with another required package like numpy
Move tensorflow installation to the test harness section instead
errors.golden_answer: Remove pip3 install tensorflow from the conda installation commands
